titleStmt.title: 1598 Speculi Britan[n]iæ pars the description of Hartfordshire by Iohn Norden.
Speculum Britanniae. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?
Kip, William, engraver.

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved. The "5" is reversed; the "e" in "description" is altered from an "i".
Running title reads: The discription of Hartfordshire.
The map is signed: Wilhelmus kip sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
